fields.name: Create a new experiment
fields.description:
During this phase, we would like your feedback on the process of creating an experiment. 
Steps involved in this task:
- Go to the index and click Create new experiment
- Follow the steps to creating an experiment
- Once you are done or if you cannot complete this task, please provide feedback!

fields.name: Enable Continuous Integration
fields.description:
For the next step, please enable Continuous Integration and run your first build.
This task consists of the following steps:
- Go to your experiment detail page
- Go to the tab Continuous Integration
- Enable and run a build
Once you are done or if you are stuck, please leave feedback!

fields.name: Add a requirement
fields.description:
For this task, add a requirement to your experiment and rebuild the requirements.txt file.
This task consists of the following steps:
- Go to the experiment detail page
- Go to the Manage Your Dependencies tab
- Add a dependency and rebuild the requirements file
